TypeSignature.Value: public delegate TValue ConditionalWeakTable<TKey,TValue>.CreateValueCallback(TKey key) where TKey : class where TValue : class;
.class nested public auto ansi sealed ConditionalWeakTable`2/CreateValueCallback<class TKey, class TValue> extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function ConditionalWeakTable(Of TKey, TValue).CreateValueCallback(key As TKey) As TValue
public: where TKey : class where TValue : classdelegate TValue ConditionalWeakTable<TKey, TValue>::CreateValueCallback(TKey key);

param.name: key
param.span: 屬於所要建立之值的索引鍵。

span.span: The key that belongs to the value to create.

summary.span: 代表方法，這個方法會建立非預設值，以作為索引鍵/值組的一部分加入 物件。

span.span: Represents a method that creates a non-default value to add as part of a key/value pair to a object.

returns.span: 參考類型的執行個體，代表要附加至所指定索引鍵的值。

span.span: An instance of a reference type that represents the value to attach to the specified key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 委派所封裝所叫用回呼方法中找不到方法金鑰傳遞至方法時物件。The delegate encapsulates a callback method that is invoked by the method when the key passed to the method is not found in the object. 方法就會傳遞的回呼方法，表示是以動態方式附加屬性值的受管理的物件的索引鍵。The method passes the callback method the key that represents a managed object to which a property value is to be dynamically attached. 方法負責傳回至呼叫端，其接著會新增至資料表的索引鍵/值組的屬性值。The method is responsible for returning the property value to its caller, which, in turn, adds the key/value pair to the table. 方法用來傳回可附加至指定之索引鍵的參考類型的執行個體。The method is used to return an instance of a reference type that can be attached to the specified key. 它可讓使用非預設值初始化該執行個體。It enables that instance to be initialized using non-default values. 如果在資料表中，找不到索引鍵方法將索引鍵/值組中的值，初始化使用預設值。If the key is not found in the table, the method adds a key/value pair in which the value is initialized using default values. ## Examples 下列範例會定義`MainClass`類別和`MainInfo`類別。The following example defines a `MainClass` class and a `MainInfo` class. `MainInfo` 相關資訊提供`MainClass`執行個體。`MainInfo` provides information about the `MainClass` instance. 它也會定義靜態 (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)`CreateAttachedValue`方法可以指派給委派，並傳遞給方法。It also defines a static (`Shared` in Visual Basic) `CreateAttachedValue` method that can be assigned to the delegate and passed to the method. 範例會呼叫方法，將`MainClass`物件和其相對應`MainInfo`物件資料表。The example calls the method to add a `MainClass` object and its corresponding `MainInfo` object to a table. 此範例也說明如何呼叫和方法，以將索引鍵/值組加入至資料表，而呼叫方法來擷取屬於現有的索引鍵的值。The example also illustrates calls to the and methods to add key/value pairs to the table, and a call to the method to retrieve the value that belongs to an existing key.
